String.string: Please bring me the treasures of Baracos. I've spent my entire life dreaming about them!
What else is a lie? Do we really even exist?
Examine treasure chests in the Golden Labyrinth. [You must select Golden Labyrinth (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:208#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Deliver the recovered goods to Avil.
